Description.Text: Smetana Hotel is located right in the heart of the old town Prague and less than a minutes` walk from the famous Charles Bridge on the Vltava River and offers the ideal base for exploring the city. It was built in the 18th century according to the design of architect Jan Josef Wirch. Spacious and individually furnished with care each of the rooms and suites is unique and offers every comfort and luxury to make guests experience memorable. Services include room service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and picnic basket for a great day outdoors.
